description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Pineapple With Macadamia Crunch recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Grilled fruit,Pescatarian,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Pineapple,Halal,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Chargrilled Pineapple With Macadamia Crunch Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp ginger paste (or finely grated ginger)

recipeInstructions.text: Line a flat tray with baking paper. Toast the macadamias in a small frying pan over medium-high heat until lightly browned. Add syrup. Cook, shaking pan constantly for 1-2 minutes or until coated and mixture is thickened slightly. Pour onto lined tray. Leave to cool and set. Break into small pieces.
Stir sugar, ginger and yoghurt into a small bowl. Refrigerate until required.

Preheat barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Brush pineapple wedges with butter. Cook for 3-5 minutes or until golden. Serve pineapple with ginger yoghurt and topped with macadamias crunch and mint leaves.
